alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 24 at 3:47AM MDT until May 24 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 8 inches. * WHERE...Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000 Feet, Pikes Peak Above 11000 Feet, Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 and 11000 Feet and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slushy and snow packed roads today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
